trans-unit.source: An angular axis, where the values are placed around the chart.
trans-unit.target: 一个角度轴,其中的值是围绕图表放置的。

trans-unit.source: An animation can loop any number of times by setting the loopCount property. When an animation's current time reaches its duration(), it will reset the current time and keep running. A loop count of 1 (the default value) means that the animation will run one time. Note that a duration of -1 means that the animation will run until stopped; the current time will increase indefinitely. When the current time equals duration() and the animation is in its final loop, the Stopped state is entered, and the finished() signal is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置loopCount属性，动画可以循环任意次数。当动画的当前时间达到其持续时间（）时，它将重置当前时间并继续运行。循环计数1（默认值）表示动画将运行一次。请注意，持续时间-1表示动画将一直运行直到停止；当前时间将无限期增加。当当前时间等于duration（）并且动画处于其最终循环中时，进入Stopped状态，并发出finish（）信号。

trans-unit.source: An animation group is a container for animations (subclasses of QAbstractAnimation). A group is usually responsible for managing the state of its animations, i.e., it decides when to start, stop, resume, and pause them. Currently, Qt provides two such groups: QParallelAnimationGroup and QSequentialAnimationGroup. Look up their class descriptions for details.
trans-unit.target: 动画组是动画的容器（QAbstractAnimation的子类）。组通常负责管理其动画的状态，即，它决定何时开始，停止，继续和暂停它们。当前，Qt提供了两个这样的组：QParallelAnimationGroup和QSequentialAnimationGroup。查找其类说明以获取详细信息。

trans-unit.source: An application can have only one menu bar, but several toolbars.
trans-unit.target: 一个应用程序只能有一个菜单栏，但可以有几个工具栏。

trans-unit.source: An application can load pages into the WebEngineView, using either the url property or the loadHtml method and navigate within the view's session history. The GET method is always used to load URLs.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以使用url属性或loadHtml方法将页面加载到WebEngineView中，并在视图的会话历史记录中导航。GET方法始终用于加载URL。

trans-unit.source: An application can load pages into the WebEngineView, using either the url property or the loadHtml method and navigate within the view's session history. The GET method is always used to load URLs.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以使用url属性或loadHtml方法将页面加载到WebEngineView中，并在视图的会话历史记录中导航。GET方法始终用于加载URL。

trans-unit.source: An application can use Jump Lists to provide users with faster access to files or to display shortcuts to tasks or commands.
trans-unit.target: 一个应用程序可以使用跳转列表为用户提供更快的访问文件或显示任务或命令的快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: An application has an applicationDirPath() and an applicationFilePath(). Library paths (see QLibrary) can be retrieved with libraryPaths() and manipulated by setLibraryPaths(), addLibraryPath(), and removeLibraryPath().
trans-unit.target: 应用程序具有applicationDirPath（）和applicationFilePath（）。可以使用libraryPaths（）检索库路径（请参阅QLibrary），并可以通过setLibraryPaths（），addLibraryPath（）和removeLibraryPath（）对其进行操作。

trans-unit.source: An application manager would typically implement additional features such as application life cycle, virtual keyboard input, security, and Inter-Process Communication (IPC). Qt provides the APIs that can be used to develop the remaining parts of an application manager in other modules. The Qt Automotive Suite provides Qt Application Manager, which is a complete application manager that includes a compositor developed using Qt Wayland Compositor.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序管理器通常会实现其他功能，例如应用程序生命周期，虚拟键盘输入，安全性和进程间通信（IPC）。Qt提供了可用于开发其他模块中应用程序管理器其余部分的API。在Qt的汽车套件提供的Qt应用程序管理器，这是一个完整的应用程序管理器，包括使用Qt的Wayland合成器开发的合成。

trans-unit.source: An application manager would typically implement additional features such as application life cycle, virtual keyboard input, security, and Inter-Process Communication (IPC). Qt provides the APIs that can be used to develop the remaining parts of an application manager in other modules. The Qt Automotive Suite provides Qt Application Manager, which is a complete application manager that includes a compositor developed using Qt Wayland Compositor.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序管理器通常会实现其他功能，例如应用程序生命周期，虚拟键盘输入，安全性和进程间通信（IPC）。 Qt提供了可用于开发其他模块中应用程序管理器其余部分的API。在Qt的汽车套件提供的Qt应用程序管理器，这是一个完整的应用程序管理器，包括使用Qt的Wayland合成器开发的合成。

trans-unit.source: An application often has multiple undo stacks, one for each opened document. At the same time, an application usually has one undo action and one redo action, which triggers undo or redo in the active document.
trans-unit.target: 一个应用程序通常有多个撤销堆栈,每个打开的文档都有一个。同时,一个应用程序通常有一个撤销操作和一个重做操作,在活动文档中触发撤销或重做。

trans-unit.source: An application often has multiple undo stacks, one for each opened document. The active stack is the one associated with the currently active document. If the stack belongs to a QUndoGroup, calls to QUndoGroup::undo() or QUndoGroup::redo() will be forwarded to this stack when it is active. If the QUndoGroup is watched by a QUndoView, the view will display the contents of this stack when it is active. If the stack does not belong to a QUndoGroup, making it active has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 一个应用程序通常具有多个撤消堆栈，每个打开的文档一个。活动堆栈是与当前活动文档关联的堆栈。如果堆栈属于QUndoGroup，则在活动堆栈时，对QUndoGroup :: undo（）或QUndoGroup :: redo（）的调用将转发到该堆栈。如果QUndoView监视QUndoGroup，则该视图在活动时将显示该堆栈的内容。如果堆栈不属于QUndoGroup，则使其变为活动状态无效。

trans-unit.source: An application on Windows can assume one of the following levels of "DPI Awareness":
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上的应用程序可以承担以下 "DPI意识 "级别之一。

trans-unit.source: An application will typically use QOffscreenSurface to perform some time-consuming tasks in a separate thread in order to avoid stalling the main rendering thread. Resources created in the QOffscreenSurface's context can be shared with the main OpenGL context. Some common use cases are asynchronous texture uploads or rendering into a QOpenGLFramebufferObject.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免拖延主渲染线程，应用程序通常将使用QOffscreenSurface在单独的线程中执行一些耗时的任务。在QOffscreenSurface上下文中创建的资源可以与主OpenGL上下文共享。一些常见的用例是异步纹理上载或渲染到QOpenGLFramebufferObject中。

trans-unit.source: An application will typically use QWidget or QQuickView for its UI, and not QWindow directly. Still, it is possible to render directly to a QWindow with QBackingStore or QOpenGLContext, when wanting to keep dependencies to a minimum or when wanting to use OpenGL directly. The Raster Window Example and OpenGL Window Example are useful reference examples for how to render to a QWindow using either approach.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常会将QWidget或QQuickView用于其UI，而不是直接使用QWindow。尽管如此，它可以直接渲染到QWindow与QBackingStore或QOpenGLContext，希望保持的依赖降到最低或希望直接使用OpenGL时当。“ 栅格窗口示例”和“ OpenGL窗口示例”是有关如何使用任一方法渲染到QWindow的有用参考示例。

trans-unit.source: An application will typically use QWidget or QQuickView for its UI, and not QWindow directly. Still, it is possible to render directly to a QWindow with QBackingStore or QOpenGLContext, when wanting to keep dependencies to a minimum or when wanting to use OpenGL directly. The Raster Window Example and OpenGL Window Example are useful reference examples for how to render to a QWindow using either approach.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常会将QWidget或QQuickView用于其UI，而不是直接使用QWindow。但是，当希望将依赖关系保持在最低水平或希望直接使用OpenGL时，仍然可以使用QBackingStore或QOpenGLContext直接渲染到QWindow 。“栅格窗口示例”和“ OpenGL窗口示例”是有关如何使用任一方法渲染到QWindow的有用参考示例。

trans-unit.source: An application will typically use QWidget or QQuickView for its UI, and not QWindow directly. Still, it is possible to render directly to a QWindow with QBackingStore or QOpenGLContext, when wanting to keep dependencies to a minimum or when wanting to use OpenGL directly. The Raster Window Example and OpenGL Window Example are useful reference examples for how to render to a QWindow using either approach.

trans-unit.source: An application will typically use QOffscreenSurface to perform some time-consuming tasks in a separate thread in order to avoid stalling the main rendering thread. Resources created in the QOffscreenSurface's context can be shared with the main OpenGL context. Some common use cases are asynchronous texture uploads or rendering into a QOpenGLFramebufferObject.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常将使用QOffscreenSurface在单独的线程中执行一些耗时的任务，以避免使主渲染线程停顿。在QOffscreenSurface上下文中创建的资源可以与主OpenGL上下文共享。一些常见的用例是异步纹理上载或渲染到QOpenGLFramebufferObject中。

trans-unit.source: An application written in QML uses memory from both the C++ heap and an automatically managed JavaScript heap. The application developer needs to be aware of the subtleties of each in order to maximise performance.
trans-unit.target: 一个用QML编写的应用程序会使用C++堆和自动管理的JavaScript堆的内存。应用程序开发人员需要了解两者的细微差别,以便最大限度地提高性能。

trans-unit.source: An application written in QML will (most likely) require garbage collection to be performed at some stage. While garbage collection will be automatically triggered by the JavaScript engine when the amount of available free memory is low, it is occasionally better if the application developer makes decisions about when to invoke the garbage collector manually (although usually this is not the case).
trans-unit.target: 一个用QML编写的应用程序将(很可能)需要在某个阶段执行垃圾收集。虽然当可用的空闲内存量较少时,垃圾收集会由JavaScript引擎自动触发,但如果应用程序开发人员决定何时手动调用垃圾收集器,有时会更好(尽管通常不是这种情况)。

trans-unit.source: An aqua filter.
trans-unit.target: 水族过滤器。

trans-unit.source: An arc is a section of circles or ellipses. Given the radius and the start and end points, there are two ellipses that connect the points. This property defines the rotation of the X axis of these ellipses.
trans-unit.target: 弧是圆或椭圆的一段。给定半径、起点和终点,就会有两个椭圆连接这两点,这个属性定义了这些椭圆的X轴的旋转。这个属性定义了这些椭圆的X轴的旋转。

trans-unit.target: 区域图例标记与QAreaSeries对象相关，因此一个区域序列生成一个标记。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the descriptions of all connected screens. The elements of the array are objects with the same properties as the Screen attached object. In practice the array corresponds to the screen list returned by QGuiApplication::screens(). In addition to examining properties like name, width, height, etc., the array elements can also be assigned to the screen property of Window items, thus serving as an alternative to the C++ side's QWindow::setScreen(). This property has been added in Qt 5.9.
trans-unit.target: 包含所有已连接屏幕的描述的数组。数组的元素是与屏幕附加对象具有相同属性的对象。实际上，该数组对应于QGuiApplication :: screens（）返回的屏幕列表。除了检查名称，宽度，高度等属性外，还可以将数组元素分配给Window项的screen属性，从而可以替代C ++方面的QWindow :: setScreen（）。此属性已在Qt 5.9中添加。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the descriptions of all connected screens. The elements of the array are objects with the same properties as the Screen attached object. In practice the array corresponds to the screen list returned by QGuiApplication::screens(). In addition to examining properties like name, width, height, etc., the array elements can also be assigned to the screen property of Window items, thus serving as an alternative to the C++ side's QWindow::setScreen(). This property has been added in Qt 5.9.
trans-unit.target: 包含所有已连接屏幕的描述的数组。数组的元素是与屏幕附加对象具有相同属性的对象。实际上，该数组对应于QGuiApplication :: screens（）返回的屏幕列表。除了检查名称，宽度，高度等属性外，还可以将数组元素分配给Window项目的screen属性，从而可以替代C ++方面的QWindow :: setScreen（）。此属性已在Qt 5.9中添加。

trans-unit.source: An array element, usually represented by QList<T> or QVector<T>. Note: QByteArray and associative maps are not considered arrays, even if the D-Bus protocol transports them as such.
trans-unit.target: 通常由QList <T>或QVector <T> 表示的数组元素。注意：即使D-Bus协议按原样传输它们，也不能将QByteArray和关联映射视为数组。

trans-unit.source: An article is created using \page command. The first argument is the HTML file that QDoc will create. The topic is supplemented with context commands, the \title and \nextpage commands. There are several other QDoc commands such as the \list command.

trans-unit.target: 异步请求的处理方式一般如下。

trans-unit.source: An attached ScrollBar re-parents itself to the target Flickable. A vertically attached ScrollBar resizes itself to the height of the Flickable, and positions itself to either side of it based on the layout direction. A horizontally attached ScrollBar resizes itself to the width of the Flickable, and positions itself to the bottom. The automatic geometry management can be disabled by specifying another parent for the attached ScrollBar. This can be useful, for example, if the ScrollBar should be placed outside a clipping Flickable. This is demonstrated by the following example:
trans-unit.target: 附加的ScrollBar将自身重新定位到目标Flickable。垂直连接的ScrollBar会将其自身调整为Flickable的高度，并根据布局方向将其自身定位在Flickable的任一侧。水平连接的ScrollBar会将其大小调整为Flickable的宽度，并将其放置在底部。可以通过为附加的ScrollBar指定另一个父级来禁用自动几何管理。例如，在将ScrollBar放置在剪辑Flickable外部的情况下，这将很有用。以下示例说明了这一点：

This can be useful, for example, if the ScrollIndicator should be placed outside a clipping Flickable. This is demonstrated by the following example:

trans-unit.source: An attached signal handler is referred to in the same way. For example, the Component.onCompleted attached signal handler is commonly used to execute some JavaScript code when a component's creation process has been completed. In the example below, once the ListModel has been fully created, its Component.onCompleted signal handler will automatically be invoked to populate the model:

trans-unit.source: An attacker transmits a series of handshake initiation requests with a forged source of the victim, making the server act as an amplifier. Normally, the server would reply to the victim machine with a Certificate message, which can be quite large, thus flooding the victim machine with datagrams.
trans-unit.target: 攻击者用伪造的受害者源传送一系列握手启动请求,使服务器充当放大器。通常情况下,服务器会向受害者机器回复一个Certificate消息,这个消息可能相当大,从而使受害者机器的数据报泛滥。

trans-unit.source: An attacker transmits a series of handshake initiation requests, causing a server to allocate excessive resources and potentially perform expensive cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: 攻击者传输一系列握手启动请求,导致服务器分配过多的资源,并可能执行昂贵的加密操作。

trans-unit.source: An empty document contains a root frame which itself contains a single empty text block. Frames provide logical separation between parts of the document, but also have properties that determine how they will appear when rendered. A table is a specialized type of frame that consists of a number of cells, arranged into rows and columns, each of which can contain further structure and text. Tables provide management and layout features that allow flexible configurations of cells to be created.

trans-unit.source: An example of this tradeoff can be seen by examining the LIS302DL accelerometer. It has only 256 possible values to report with. trans-unit.source: An example of using the delayed SSL handshake to secure an existing connection is the case where an SSL server secures an incoming connection. Suppose you create an SSL server class as a subclass of QTcpServer. You would override QTcpServer::incomingConnection() with something like the example below, which first constructs an instance of QSslSocket and then calls setSocketDescriptor() to set the new socket's descriptor to the existing one passed in. It then initiates the SSL handshake by calling startServerEncryption().
trans-unit.target: 使用延迟SSL握手来保护现有连接的示例是SSL服务器保护传入连接的情况。假设您创建一个SSL服务器类作为QTcpServer的子类。您将使用下面的示例覆盖QTcpServer :: incomingConnection（），该示例首先构造QSslSocket的实例，然后调用setSocketDescriptor（）将新的套接字的描述符设置为传入的现有套接字的描述符。然后，通过调用来启动SSL握手startServerEncryption（）。

trans-unit.source: An example of using the delayed SSL handshake to secure an existing connection is the case where an SSL server secures an incoming connection. Suppose you create an SSL server class as a subclass of QTcpServer. You would override QTcpServer::incomingConnection() with something like the example below, which first constructs an instance of QSslSocket and then calls setSocketDescriptor() to set the new socket's descriptor to the existing one passed in. It then initiates the SSL handshake by calling startServerEncryption().
trans-unit.target: 使用延迟SSL握手来保护现有连接的示例是SSL服务器保护传入连接的情况。假设您创建一个SSL服务器类作为QTcpServer的子类。您将使用下面的示例重写QTcpServer :: incomingConnection（），该示例首先构造QSslSocket的实例，然后调用setSocketDescriptor（）来将新套接字的描述符设置为传入的现有描述符。然后通过调用发起SSL握手startServerEncryption（）。

trans-unit.source: An executable server has the advantage of being able to run as a stand-alone application, but adds considerable overhead to the communication between the COM client and the COM object. If the control has a programming error only the server process running the control will crash, and the client application will probably continue to run. Not all COM clients support executable servers.
trans-unit.target: 可执行服务器的优点是可以作为一个独立的应用程序运行,但给COM客户端和COM对象之间的通信增加了相当大的开销。如果控件出现编程错误,只有运行该控件的服务器进程会崩溃,而客户端应用程序可能会继续运行。并非所有的COM客户端都支持可执行的服务器。

trans-unit.target: 可以使用removeRow（）或takeRow（）删除现有的子行；相应地，可以使用removeColumn（）或takeColumn（）删除列。

trans-unit.source: An experimental implementation of high-DPI scaling was introduced in Qt 5.4. It was enabled by the environment variable QT_DEVICE_PIXEL_RATIO, which could be set to a numerical scale factor or "auto". This variable is deprecated in Qt 5.6.
trans-unit.target: Qt 5.4中引入了高DPI缩放的实验实现。它由环境变量 QT_DEVICE_PIXEL_RATIO 启用，可以将其设置为数字比例因子或 "auto" 。Qt 5.6中不推荐使用此变量。

trans-unit.source: An exposed window is potentially visible to the user. If the window is moved off screen, is made totally obscured by another window, is minimized, or similar, an expose event is sent to the window, and isExposed() might change to false.
trans-unit.target: 一个暴露的窗口对用户来说是潜在的可见的。如果窗口被移出屏幕,被另一个窗口完全遮挡,被最小化,或者类似的情况,一个暴露事件会被发送到窗口,并且isExposed()可能会变为false。

trans-unit.source: An exposed window is potentially visible to the user. If the window is moved off screen, is made totally obscured by another window, is minimized, or similar, this function might be called and the value of isExposed() might change to false. You may use this event to limit expensive operations such as animations to only run when the window is exposed.
trans-unit.target: 用户可能会看到一个暴露的窗口。如果将窗口移出屏幕，被另一个窗口完全遮挡，最小化或类似操作，则可能会调用此函数，并且isExposed（）的值可能更改为false。您可以使用此事件将昂贵的操作（例如动画）限制为仅在暴露窗口时才运行。

trans-unit.source: An expression that evaluates to a boolean value (i.e. type xs:boolean) is that value.

trans-unit.source: An extension class is a regular QObject, with a constructor that takes a QObject pointer. However, the extension class creation is delayed until the first extended property is accessed. The extension class is created and the target object is passed in as the parent. When the property on the original is accessed, the corresponding property on the extension object is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 扩展类是常规QObject，其构造函数采用QObject指针。但是，扩展类的创建被延迟，直到访问第一个扩展属性。创建扩展类，并将目标对象作为父级传递。访问原始属性时，将使用扩展对象上的相应属性。

trans-unit.source: An extension plugin allows third-party providers to enhance the functionality of the virtual keyboard without recompiling it. Currently the extension plugin can provide keyboard layouts and custom input methods. Creating a plugin for Qt Virtual Keyboard is similar to the standard way of creating a Qt plugin:
trans-unit.target: 扩展插件允许第三方供应商在不重新编译虚拟键盘的情况下,增强虚拟键盘的功能。目前扩展插件可以提供键盘布局和自定义输入法。创建Qt虚拟键盘的插件与创建Qt插件的标准方式类似。

trans-unit.source: An implicitly shared class has control of its internal data. In any member functions that modify its data, it automatically detaches before modifying the data. Notice, however, the special case with container iterators; see Implicit sharing iterator problem.

trans-unit.source: An import statement allows clients to tell the engine which modules, JavaScript resources and component directories are used within a QML document. The types which may be used within a document depends on which modules, resources and directories are imported by the document.
trans-unit.target: 导入语句允许客户告诉引擎在QML文档中使用哪些模块、JavaScript资源和组件目录。文档中可以使用的类型取决于文档导入的模块、资源和目录。

trans-unit.source: An important difference between these two ways of creating replicas is the behavior before the replica is initialized. Since a dynamic replica only gets a metaObject after initialization, it basically has no API before initialization. No properties, and no signals to connect slots to. Due to the compile-time creation of the metaObject for compiled replicas, their API is available when the replica is instantiated. You can even provide default values for properties in the template file, which will be used until the replica is initialized with current values from the source.
trans-unit.target: 这两种创建副本的方式的一个重要区别是副本初始化之前的行为。由于动态复制体只有在初始化后才会得到一个元Object,所以在初始化之前,它基本上没有API。没有属性,也没有信号来连接插槽。由于编译后的副本的元Object是在编译时创建的,所以在实例化副本时,它们的API是可用的。你甚至可以在模板文件中为属性提供默认值,这些值将被使用,直到复制体被初始化为源的当前值。

trans-unit.source: An important difference between these two ways of creating replicas is the behavior before the replica is initialized. Since a dynamic replica only gets a metaObject after initialization, it has basically no API before initialization -- no properties, and no signals to connect slots to.
trans-unit.target: 这两种创建副本的方式的一个重要区别是副本初始化前的行为。由于动态副本只有在初始化之后才会得到一个元Object,所以在初始化之前,它基本没有API--没有属性,也没有信号连接插槽。

trans-unit.source: An in-process server is usually smaller and has faster startup time. The communication between client and server is done directly through virtual function calls and does not introduce the overhead required for remote procedure calls. However, if the server crashes the client application is likely to crash as well, and not every functionality is available for in-process servers (i.e. register in the COM's running-object-table).
trans-unit.target: 进程内服务器通常较小,启动时间较快。客户端和服务器之间的通信直接通过虚拟函数调用完成,不会引入远程过程调用所需的开销。但是,如果服务器崩溃,客户端应用程序很可能也会崩溃,而且并不是每一个功能都能为进程内服务器所用(即在COM的运行对象表中注册)。

trans-unit.source: An individual item's position is specified in terms of its parent's coordinate system. This means that reading x,y values from non-sibling items may require conversion to convert them into the same coordinate system. Scene coordinates are often used as the intermediate coordinate system when this occurs.
trans-unit.target: 单个项的位置是以其父项的坐标系来指定的,这意味着从非同级项读取x,y值可能需要将它们转换为相同的坐标系。这意味着从非同级项目读取x,y值可能需要转换,以将它们转换为相同的坐标系。在这种情况下,场景坐标通常被用作中间坐标系。

trans-unit.source: An instance of xs:time can't be represented correctly as an instance of QVariant::Time, unless the xs:time is a UTC time. This is because xs:time has a zone offset (0 for UTC) in addition to the time value, which the QTime in QVariant::Time does not have. This means that if an XQuery tries to return an atomic value of type xs:time, an invalid QVariant will be returned. A query can return an atomic value of type xs:time by either converting it to an xs:dateTime with an arbitrary date, or to an xs:string.
trans-unit.target: 实例 xs:time 不能正确表示的QVariant ::时间的情况下，除非 xs:time 是UTC时间。这是因为xs：time除了时间值（QVariant :: Time中的QTime没有该时间值）之外，还具有区域偏移（对于UTC为0）。这意味着，如果XQuery尝试返回类型为 xs:time 的原子值，则将返回无效的QVariant。查询可以通过将其转换为具有任意日期的 xs:dateTime 或 xs:string 来返回类型为xs：time的原子值。

trans-unit.source: An instance of xs:time can't be represented correctly as an instance of QVariant::Time, unless the xs:time is a UTC time. This means that if an XQuery tries to return an atomic value of type xs:time, an invalid QVariant will be returned. A query can return an atomic value of type xs:time by either converting it to an xs:dateTime with an arbitrary date, or to an xs:string.

trans-unit.source: An instance of a QLibrary object operates on a single shared object file (which we call a "library", but is also known as a "DLL"). A QLibrary provides access to the functionality in the library in a platform independent way. You can either pass a file name in the constructor, or set it explicitly with setFileName(). When loading the library, QLibrary searches in all the system-specific library locations (e.g. LD_LIBRARY_PATH on Unix), unless the file name has an absolute path.
trans-unit.target: QLibrary对象的实例在单个共享对象文件（我们称为“库”，但也称为“ DLL”）上进行操作。一个QLibrary提供了一个平台无关的方式访问功能在库中。您可以在构造函数中传递文件名，也可以使用setFileName（）对其进行显式设置。加载库时，除非文件名具有绝对路径，否则QLibrary会搜索所有系统特定的库位置（例如Unix上的 LD_LIBRARY_PATH ）。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a SelectionListModel cannot be created directly. Instead, the InputEngine manages the instances and provides access to the model by InputEngine::wordCandidateListModel property.
trans-unit.target: 无法直接创建SelectionListModel的实例。而是由InputEngine管理实例，并通过InputEngine :: wordCandidateListModel属性提供对模型的访问。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a QPluginLoader object operates on a single shared library file, which we call a plugin. It provides access to the functionality in the plugin in a platform-independent way. To specify which plugin to load, either pass a file name in the constructor or set it with setFileName().
trans-unit.target: QPluginLoader对象的实例在单个共享库文件（称为插件）上运行。它以独立于平台的方式提供对插件中功能的访问。要指定要加载的插件，请在构造函数中传递文件名，或使用setFileName（）进行设置。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the QStyleOptionTab class has typeSO_Tab and version 3. The type is used internally by QStyleOption, its subclasses, and qstyleoption_cast() to determine the type of style option. In general you do not need to worry about this unless you want to create your own QStyleOption subclass and your own styles. The version is used by QStyleOption subclasses to implement extensions without breaking compatibility. If you use qstyleoption_cast(), you normally do not need to check it.

trans-unit.source: An item can be removed from the persistedItems group by setting the DelegateModel.inPersistedItems property to false. If the item is not referenced by a view at that time it will be destroyed. Adding an item to this group will not create a new instance.

trans-unit.source: An item can have several roles, giving out different data depending on the role specified. The items in our model only have one role, DisplayRole, so we return the data for items irrespective of the role specified. However, we could reuse the data we provide for the DisplayRole in other roles, such as the ToolTipRole that views can use to display information about items in a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 一个项目可以具有多个角色，根据指定的角色给出不同的数据。我们模型中的项目只有一个角色DisplayRole，因此无论指定的角色如何，我们都将返回项目的数据。但是，我们可以在其他角色中重用为DisplayRole提供的数据，例如ToolTipRole，视图可用来在工具提示中显示有关项目的信息。

trans-unit.source: An item's children are stacked on top of the parent, and sibling items are stacked by insertion order (i.e., in the same order that they were either added to the scene, or added to the same parent). If you add item A, and then B, then B will be on top of A. If you then add C, the items' stacking order will be A, then B, then C.
trans-unit.target: 一个项目的子项目堆叠在父项目之上,而兄弟项目则按照插入顺序(即按照它们被添加到场景中的顺序,或者添加到同一父项目中的顺序)进行堆叠。如果你添加了物品A,然后添加了B,那么B就会在A的上面,如果你再添加C,物品的堆叠顺序就是A,然后是B,然后是C。

trans-unit.source: An off-the-record profile leaves no record on the local machine, and has no persistent data or cache. Thus, the HTTP cache can only be in memory and the cookies can only be non-persistent. Trying to change these settings will have no effect.

trans-unit.source: An opacity effect renders the source with an opacity. This effect is useful for making the source semi-transparent, similar to a fade-in/fade-out sequence. The opacity can be modified using the setOpacity() function.
trans-unit.target: 不透明度效果使源具有不透明度。该效果对于使源半透明非常有用，类似于淡入/淡出序列。可以使用setOpacity（）函数修改不透明度。

trans-unit.source: An open session is created by calling QNetworkSession::open() and closed via QNetworkSession::close(), respectively. If the session is disconnected at the time of the open() call the underlying interface is started; otherwise only the reference counter against the global session is incremented. The opposite behavior can be observed when using close().
trans-unit.target: 通过调用QNetworkSession :: open（）创建打开的会话，并分别通过QNetworkSession :: close（）关闭。如果在open（）调用时会话断开连接，则启动底层接口；否则，只会增加针对全局会话的引用计数器。使用close（）时，可以观察到相反的行为。

trans-unit.target: 覆盖属性根据引用范围来解析。在Person组件的范围内，或从引用Person组件实例的外部范围内， title 解析为Person.qml中声明的属性。该 fullName 功能将参照 title 里面的人声明的属性。

trans-unit.source: Android only indirectly permits the adjustment of this parameter set. The connection parameters are separated into three categories (high, low & balanced priority). Each category implies a pre-configured set of values for QLowEnergyConnectionParameters::minimumInterval(), QLowEnergyConnectionParameters::maximumInterval() and QLowEnergyConnectionParameters::latency(). Although the connection request is an asynchronous operation, Android does not provide a callback stating the result of the request. This is an acknowledged Android bug. Due to this bug Android does not emit the connectionUpdated() signal.
trans-unit.target: Android仅间接允许调整此参数集。连接参数分为三类（高，低和平衡优先级）。每个类别都表示QLowEnergyConnectionParameters :: minimumInterval（），QLowEnergyConnectionParameters :: maximumInterval（）和QLowEnergyConnectionParameters :: latency（）的一组预先配置的值。尽管连接请求是异步操作，但Android并未提供说明请求结果的回调。这是一个公认的Android错误。由于这个错误，Android不会发出connectionUpdated（）信号。

trans-unit.source: Android only indirectly permits the adjustment of this parameter set. The platform separates the connection parameters into three categories (hight, low & balanced priority). Each category implies a predefined set of values for minimumInterval(), maximumInterval() and latency(). Additionally, the value ranges of each category can vary from one Android device to the next. Qt uses the minimumInterval() to determine the target category as follows:
trans-unit.target: Android仅间接允许调整此参数集。该平台将连接参数分为三类（高，低和平衡优先级）。每个类别都暗含了一组针对minimumInterval（），maximumInterval（）和latency（）的预定义值。此外，每个类别的值范围可能从一台Android设备到另一台Android设备有所不同。Qt使用minimumInterval（）确定目标类别，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Android only supports two levels of security (secure and non-secure). If this flag is set to QBluetooth::NoSecurity the server object will not employ any authentication or encryption. Any other security flag combination will trigger a secure Bluetooth connection.
trans-unit.target: Android仅支持两个安全级别（安全和非安全）。如果此标志设置为QBluetooth :: NoSecurity，则服务器对象将不使用任何身份验证或加密。任何其他安全标记组合将触发安全的蓝牙连接。

trans-unit.source: Android only supports two levels of security (secure and non-secure). If this flag is set to QBluetooth::NoSecurity the socket object will not employ any authentication or encryption. Any other security flag combination will trigger a secure Bluetooth connection. This flag is set to QBluetooth::Secure by default.
trans-unit.target: Android仅支持两个安全级别（安全和非安全）。如果此标志设置为QBluetooth :: NoSecurity，则套接字对象将不使用任何身份验证或加密。任何其他安全标记组合将触发安全的蓝牙连接。默认情况下，此标志设置为QBluetooth :: Secure。

trans-unit.source: AnimationController QML Type

trans-unit.source: AnimationController type controls the selection and playback of animations. The type can be used to find all animations from Entity tree and create AnimationGroups from the animations with the same name. The user can select which animation group is currently controlled with the animation controller by setting the active animation. The animation position is then propagated to that group after scaling and offsetting the provided position value with the positionScale and positionOffset values.
trans-unit.target: AnimationController类型控制动画的选择和播放。该类型可用于从实体树中查找所有动画，并从具有相同名称的动画创建AnimationGroup。用户可以通过设置活动动画来选择当前由动画控制器控制的动画组。然后，在缩放并使用positionScale和positionOffset值偏移提供的位置值之后，将动画位置传播到该组。

trans-unit.source: AnimationGroup type is used to group multiple animations so that they can act as one animation. The position set to the group is also set to all animations in a group. The duration is the maximum of the individual animations. The animations can be any supported animation type and do not have to have the same name.
trans-unit.target: AnimationGroup类型用于对多个动画进行分组,使它们可以作为一个动画。设置给组的位置也是设置给组中的所有动画。持续时间是各个动画的最大值。动画可以是任何支持的动画类型,不一定要有相同的名称。

trans-unit.source: Animations are created by applying animation objects to property values to gradually change the properties over time. These

trans-unit.source: Animations are created by applying animation types to property values. Animation types will interpolate property values to create smooth transitions. As well, state transitions may assign animations to state changes.

trans-unit.source: Animations are enabled or disabled based on this setting.

trans-unit.source: Animations are supported on any imported attribute. Position, rotation, scale, and pivot can all be animated. An example of our advanced support for animations would be a hierarchy of items, rotated simultaneously on arbitrary axes in arbitrary axis order. Bezier tangent value tweaked into animations is also supported.
trans-unit.target: 任何导入的属性都支持动画。位置、旋转、比例和枢轴都可以被动画化。我们对动画的高级支持的一个例子是一个项目的层次结构,以任意轴顺序在任意轴上同时旋转。还支持将贝塞尔切线值调整为动画。

trans-unit.source: Animator types are a special type of animation which operate directly on Qt Quick's scene graph, rather than the QML objects and their properties like regular Animation types do. This has the benefit that Animator based animations can animate on the scene graph's rendering thread even when the UI thread is blocked.
trans-unit.target: Animator类型是一种特殊的动画类型，可直接在Qt Quick的场景图上运行，而不是像常规Animation类型那样运行QML对象及其属性。这样的好处是，即使UI线程被阻止，基于Animator的动画也可以在场景图的渲染线程上进行动画处理。

trans-unit.source: Another approach that does not require the use of an event filter is to provide our own editor widget, perhaps subclassing QSpinBox for convenience. This alternative approach would give us more control over how the editor widget behaves at the cost of writing additional code. It is usually easier to install an event filter in the delegate if you need to customize the behavior of a standard Qt editor widget.
trans-unit.target: 不需要使用事件过滤器的另一种方法是提供我们自己的编辑器小部件，为方便起见，可能将QSpinBox子类化。这种替代方法将使我们能够更好地控制编辑器小部件的行为，而以编写附加代码为代价。如果您需要自定义标准Qt编辑器窗口小部件的行为，则通常更容易在委托中安装事件过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Another benefit is that we can explore an object's signals and slots at runtime. We can establish connections using type-safe call-by-name, without having to know the exact types of the objects we are connecting. This is impossible with a template based solution. This kind of runtime introspection opens up new possibilities, for example GUIs that are generated and connected from Qt Designer's XML UI files.
trans-unit.target: 另一个好处是,我们可以在运行时探索对象的信号和插槽。我们可以使用类型安全的逐名调用建立连接,而不必知道我们要连接的对象的确切类型。这在基于模板的解决方案中是不可能的。这种运行时自省开辟了新的可能性,例如从Qt Designer的XML UI文件中生成和连接的GUI。

trans-unit.source: Another benefit of identifying transform nodes as batch roots is that it allows the renderer to retain the parts of the tree that have not changed. For instance, say a UI consists of a list and a button row. When the list is being scrolled and delegates are being added and removed, the rest of the UI, the button row, is unchanged and can be drawn using the geometry already stored on the GPU.
trans-unit.target: 将变换节点识别为批根的另一个好处是,它允许渲染器保留树中没有变化的部分。例如,假设一个UI由一个列表和一个按钮行组成。当列表被滚动和委托人被添加和删除时,UI的其余部分,即按钮行,是不变的,可以使用已经存储在GPU上的几何体进行绘制。

trans-unit.source: Another benefit of using opaque primitives is that opaque primitives do not require GL_BLEND to be enabled, which can be quite costly, especially on mobile and embedded GPUs.
trans-unit.target: 使用不透明基元的另一个好处是，不透明基元不需要启用 GL_BLEND ，这可能会非常昂贵，尤其是在移动和嵌入式GPU上。

In Qt 6, QQuickGraphicsConfiguration provides a new home for these settings, while keeping support for the legacy environment variables, where applicable.

trans-unit.source: Another exception to Tab support is text-entry widgets that must support the insertion of tabs; almost all text editors fall into this class. Qt treats Ctrl+Tab as Tab and Ctrl+Shift+Tab as Shift+Tab, and such widgets can reimplement QWidget::event() and handle Tab before calling QWidget::event() to get normal processing of all other keys. However, since some systems use Ctrl+Tab for other purposes, and many users aren't aware of Ctrl+Tab anyway, this isn't a complete solution.
trans-unit.target: 选项卡支持的另一个例外是必须支持选项卡插入的文本输入小部件。几乎所有的文本编辑器都属于此类。Qt将Ctrl + Tab视为Tab，将Ctrl + Shift + Tab视为Shift + Tab，这样的小部件可以重新实现QWidget :: event（）并在调用QWidget :: event（）以获得所有其他键的正常处理之前处理Tab 。但是，由于某些系统将Ctrl + Tab用于其他目的，并且许多用户仍然不知道Ctrl + Tab，所以这不是一个完整的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Another method of creating object types from within QML is to use the Component type. This allows a type to be defined inline within a QML document, instead of using a separate document in a .qml file.
trans-unit.target: 在QML中创建对象类型的另一种方法是使用Component类型。这允许在QML文档中内联定义类型，而不是在 .qml 文件中使用单独的文档。

trans-unit.source: Another nuanced value is SOURCEONLYSETTER, which provides another way of specifying asymmetric behavior, where the Source (specifically the helper class, SimpleSource) will have a public getter and setter for the property, but it will be ReadOnly (with a notify signal) on the Replica side. Thus the property can be fully controlled from the Source side, but only observed from the Replica side. SOURCEONLYSETTER is the mode used by repc for MODEL and CLASS instances, meaning the Source can change the pointed to object, but the Replica can not provide a new object, as no set<Prop> or push<Prop> method is generated. Note, this does not impact the behavior of the pointed to type's properties, just the ability to change the pointer itself.
trans-unit.target: 另一个细微的值是SOURCEONLYSETTER，它提供了另一种指定不对称行为的方式，其中Source（特别是助手类 SimpleSource ）将具有该属性的公共获取器和设置器，但在属性上将为ReadOnly（带有通知信号）。副本侧。因此，可以从“ 源”端完全控制该属性，但只能从“ 副本”端进行观察。 SOURCEONLYSETTER是repc用于MODEL和CLASS实例的模式，这意味着Source可以更改指向对象的对象，但是Replica无法提供新对象，因为未生成set <Prop>或push <Prop>方法。注意，这不会影响所指向类型的属性的行为，只会影响更改指针本身的能力。

trans-unit.source: Another responsibility that QGraphicsScene has, is to propagate events from QGraphicsView. To send an event to a scene, you construct an event that inherits QEvent, and then send it using, for example, QApplication::sendEvent(). event() is responsible for dispatching the event to the individual items. Some common events are handled by convenience event handlers. For example, key press events are handled by keyPressEvent(), and mouse press events are handled by mousePressEvent().
trans-unit.target: QGraphicsScene的另一个职责是传播QGraphicsView的事件。要将事件发送到场景，可以构造一个继承QEvent的事件，然后使用例如QApplication :: sendEvent（）将其发送。event（）负责将事件调度到各个项目。一些常见事件由便利事件处理程序处理。例如，按键事件由keyPressEvent（）处理，鼠标按键事件由mousePressEvent（）处理。

trans-unit.source: Another responsibility that QGraphicsScene has, is to propagate events from QGraphicsView. To send an event to a scene, you construct an event that inherits QEvent, and then send it using, for example, QCoreApplication::sendEvent(). event() is responsible for dispatching the event to the individual items. Some common events are handled by convenience event handlers. For example, key press events are handled by keyPressEvent(), and mouse press events are handled by mousePressEvent().
trans-unit.target: QGraphicsScene的另一个职责是传播来自QGraphicsView的事件。要将事件发送到场景，请构造一个继承QEvent的事件，然后使用例如QCoreApplication :: sendEvent（）将其发送。event（）负责将事件调度到各个项目。一些常见事件由便利事件处理程序处理。例如，按键事件由keyPressEvent（）处理，而鼠标按键事件由mousePressEvent（）处理。

trans-unit.source: Another scenario is when there is no custom SPECULAR_LIGHT function provided, or when there is a light probe set in the SceneEnvironment. trans-unit.source: Anti-Aliasing
trans-unit.target: Anti-Aliasing

trans-unit.source: Anti-Aliasing Best Practices
trans-unit.target: 抗锯齿最佳实践

trans-unit.source: Anti-Aliasing Techniques
trans-unit.target: 抗锯齿技术

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliased Painting
trans-unit.target: 抗锯齿画

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing is disabled for rendering images.
trans-unit.target: 渲染图像时,抗锯齿被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing is disabled for rendering paths.
trans-unit.target: 渲染路径的抗锯齿被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing is disabled for rendering text.
trans-unit.target: 渲染文本时,抗锯齿被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing is turned on by default on C++, except in OpenGL ES2 environments, where anti-aliasing is not supported by Qt Data Visualization. To specify non-default anti-aliasing for a graph, give a custom surface format as a constructor parameter. You can use the convenience function QtDataVisualization::qDefaultSurfaceFormat() to create the surface format object.
trans-unit.target: 除OpenGL ES2环境（Qt Data Visualization不支持抗锯齿）外，C ++上的抗锯齿默认情况下处于打开状态。要为图形指定非默认抗锯齿，请提供自定义表面格式作为构造函数参数。您可以使用便利功能 QtDataVisualization::qDefaultSurfaceFormat() 创建表面格式对象。

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing rasterizer from FreeType 2
trans-unit.target: 来自FreeType 2的抗锯齿光栅化器。

trans-unit.source: Antialiasing
trans-unit.target: Antialiasing

trans-unit.source: Antialiasing and Quality
trans-unit.target: 抗锯齿和质量

trans-unit.source: Antialiasing and a smooth pixmap tranformation algorithm are both used
trans-unit.target: 反锯齿和平滑像素图转形算法都被使用了

trans-unit.source: Antialiasing in the OpenGL paint engine is done using multisampling. Most hardware require significantly more memory to do multisampling and the resulting quality is not on par with the quality of the software paint engine. The OpenGL paint engine's strength lies in its performance, not its visual rendering quality.
trans-unit.target: OpenGL绘画引擎中的抗锯齿是使用多采样来完成的。大多数硬件都需要更多的内存来进行多采样,而产生的质量与软件绘画引擎的质量不相上下。OpenGL绘画引擎的优势在于其性能,而非视觉渲染质量。

trans-unit.source: Antialiasing is used but no smooth pixmap transformation algorithm (Default)
trans-unit.target: 使用抗锯齿,但没有平滑像素图转换算法(默认)。

trans-unit.source: Antialiasing or a smooth pixmap transformation algorithm are not used
trans-unit.target: 不使用反锯齿或平滑像素图转换算法。

trans-unit.target: Any

trans-unit.source: Any Qt program can run as a Wayland client (as part of a multi-process system) or a standalone client (single-process). This is determined on startup, where you can choose between the different backends. During the development process, you can develop the client on the desktop first, then test it on the target hardware later. You don't need to run your clients on the actual target hardware all the time.
trans-unit.target: 任何Qt程序都可以作为Wayland客户端(作为多进程系统的一部分)或独立客户端(单进程)运行。这是在启动时决定的,你可以在不同的后台之间进行选择。在开发过程中,您可以先在桌面上开发客户端,然后再在目标硬件上进行测试。你不需要一直在实际的目标硬件上运行客户端。

trans-unit.source: Any additional arguments passed to Qt.callLater() will be passed on to the function invoked. Note that if redundant calls are eliminated, then only the last set of arguments will be passed to the function.
trans-unit.target: 传递给Qt的任何其他参数。callLater（）将传递给调用的函数。请注意，如果消除了多余的调用，则仅将最后一组参数传递给该函数。

trans-unit.source: Any animations defined for the x position of contentItem and background will be triggered.
trans-unit.target: 为contentItem和背景的x位置定义的所有动画都将被触发。

trans-unit.source: Any argument that isn't an option (i.e. doesn't start with a -) is stored as a "positional argument".
trans-unit.target: 任何不是选项的参数（即不是以 - 开头）都存储为“位置参数”。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to modify the global object - either implicitly or explicitly - will cause an exception. If uncaught, this will result in a warning being printed, that includes the file and line number of the offending code.
trans-unit.target: 任何试图修改全局对象的行为--无论是隐含的还是显式的--都会引起异常。如果未被捕获,将导致打印一个警告,包括违规代码的文件和行号。

trans-unit.source: Any attempts to modify the QString or copies of it will cause it to create a deep copy of the data, ensuring that the raw data isn't modified.
trans-unit.target: 任何尝试修改QString或其副本的尝试都将导致它创建数据的深层副本，从而确保未修改原始数据。

trans-unit.source: Any client QTcpSockets that are still connected must either disconnect or be reparented before the server is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 在删除服务器之前，任何仍连接的客户端QTcpSocket都必须断开连接或重新连接。

trans-unit.source: Any color in Qt is represented by the QColor class which supports the RGB, HSV and CMYK color models. QColor also support alpha-blended outlining and filling (specifying the transparency effect), and the class is platform and device independent (the colors are mapped to hardware using the QColormap class). For more information, see the QColor class documentation.
trans-unit.target: Qt中的任何颜色都由QColor类表示，该类支持RGB，HSV和CMYK颜色模型。QColor还支持alpha混合轮廓和填充（指定透明效果），并且该类与平台和设备无关（使用QColormap类将颜色映射到硬件）。有关更多信息，请参见QColor类文档。

trans-unit.source: Any configurations not listed above are not actively tested by the Qt Project. However, Qt may run on configurations other than those actively tested on, and additional configurations may be raised to tested state, if sufficient effort is made to bring continuous integration to an acceptable state for that particular configuration.
trans-unit.target: 任何没有在上面列出的配置都不会被Qt项目主动测试。但是,Qt可以在主动测试的配置之外的配置上运行,如果有足够的努力使持续集成达到特定配置的可接受状态,其他配置也可以提升到测试状态。

trans-unit.source: Any configurations not listed above are not actively tested by the Qt Project. However, Qt may run on configurations other than those actively tested on, and additional configurations may be raised to tested state, if sufficient effort is made to bring continuous integration to an acceptable state for that particular configuration. The reference configurations are subject to change during the lifetime of a Qt release.
trans-unit.target: 任何没有在上面列出的配置都不会被Qt项目主动测试。然而,Qt可能会运行在那些主动测试的配置之外的配置上,如果有足够的努力使持续集成达到特定配置的可接受状态,那么额外的配置可能会被提升到测试状态。参考配置在Qt版本的生命周期中可能会发生变化。

trans-unit.target: 写缓冲区中的任何数据都会在套接字关闭前被刷新。在关闭套接字之前,写缓冲区中的任何数据都会被刷新。

trans-unit.source: Any data that is transferred from C++ to QML, whether as a property value, a method parameter or return value, or a signal parameter value, must be of a type that is supported by the QML engine.
trans-unit.target: 任何从C++传输到QML的数据,无论是作为属性值、方法参数或返回值,还是信号参数值,都必须是QML引擎支持的类型。

trans-unit.source: Any diagnostic output that would be useful if a test fails should be part of the regular test output rather than being commented-out, disabled by preprocessor directives, or enabled only in debug builds. If a test fails during continuous integration, having all of the relevant diagnostic output in the CI logs could save you a lot of time compared to enabling the diagnostic code and testing again. Epecially, if the failure was on a platform that you don't have on your desktop.
trans-unit.target: 任何在测试失败时有用的诊断输出都应该是常规测试输出的一部分,而不是被注释出来,被预处理器指令禁用,或者只在调试构建中启用。如果一个测试在持续集成过程中失败了,与启用诊断代码和再次测试相比,在CI日志中拥有所有相关的诊断输出可以为你节省很多时间。尤其是,如果失败是在你桌面上没有的平台上。

trans-unit.source: Any object assigned to an item's data property becomes a child of the item within its QObject hierarchy, for memory management purposes. Additionally, if an object added to the data property is of the Item type, it is also assigned to the Item::children property and becomes a child of the item within the visual scene hierarchy. (Most Qt Quick hierarchy crawling algorithms, especially the rendering algorithms, only consider the visual parent hierarchy.)
trans-unit.target: 出于内存管理的目的，任何分配给项目的data属性的对象都将成为其QObject层次结构中该项目的子级。此外，如果添加到data属性的对象属于Item类型，则该对象也将分配给Item :: children属性，并成为视觉场景层次结构中该项目的子级。（大多数Qt Quick层次结构爬网算法，尤其是渲染算法，仅考虑视觉父层次结构。）

trans-unit.source: Any object declaration can define child objects through nested object declarations. In this way, any object declaration implicitly declares an object tree that may contain any number of child objects.

trans-unit.source: Any whitespace in the pattern string which is not escaped and outside a character class is ignored. Moreover, an unescaped sharp (#) outside a character class causes all the following characters, until the first newline (included), to be ignored. This can be used to increase the readability of a pattern string as well as put comments inside regular expressions; this is particularly useful if the pattern string is loaded from a file or written by the user, because in C++ code it is always possible to use the rules for string literals to put comments outside the pattern string. This option corresponds to the /x modifier in Perl regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 模式字符串中任何未转义且在字符类外部的空格都将被忽略。此外，字符类外部的未转义的尖号（＃）会导致所有随后的字符（包括第一个换行符（包括在内））被忽略。这可以用来增加模式字符串的可读性，以及在正则表达式中放置注释。如果模式字符串是从文件加载或由用户编写的，则这特别有用，因为在C ++代码中，始终可以使用字符串文字规则将注释放在模式字符串之外。此选项对应于Perl正则表达式中的 /x 修饰符。

trans-unit.source: Any whitespace in the pattern string which is not escaped and outside a character class is ignored. Moreover, an unescaped sharp (#) outside a character class causes all the following characters, until the first newline (included), to be ignored. This can be used to increase the readability of a pattern string as well as put comments inside regular expressions; this is particulary useful if the pattern string is loaded from a file or written by the user, because in C++ code it is always possible to use the rules for string literals to put comments outside the pattern string. This option corresponds to the /x modifier in Perl regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 模式字符串中任何未转义且在字符类外部的空格都将被忽略。此外，字符类外部的未转义的尖号（＃）会导致所有随后的字符（包括第一行换行符（包括在内））被忽略。这可以用来增加模式字符串的可读性，以及在正则表达式中放置注释。如果模式字符串是从文件加载或由用户编写的，则这特别有用，因为在C ++代码中，始终可以使用字符串文字规则将注释放在模式字符串之外。此选项对应于Perl正则表达式中的 /x 修饰符。

trans-unit.source: Any widgets that are allocated more space than their maximum size are allocated the maximum size space they require. (Widgets do not have to have a maximum size in which case the stretch factor is their determining factor.)
trans-unit.target: 任何被分配的空间超过其最大尺寸的小组件都会被分配到它们所需的最大尺寸空间。(小组件不一定要有最大尺寸,在这种情况下,拉伸系数是它们的决定因素。)

trans-unit.source: Apart from some extra overhead at the OS level, running multiple clients may also use more main memory as some parts need to be duplicated once per client. For example, if you run QML, each client requires a separate QML engine. Consequently, if you run a single client that uses Qt Quick Controls, it's loaded once. If you then split this client into multiple clients, you're loading Qt Quick Controls multiple times, resulting in a higher startup cost to initialize your clients.
trans-unit.target: 除了在操作系统层面上的一些额外开销之外,运行多个客户端还可能会使用更多的主内存,因为有些部分需要在每个客户端上重复一次。例如,如果你运行QML,每个客户端都需要一个单独的QML引擎。因此,如果你运行一个使用Qt Quick Controls的客户端,它就会被加载一次。如果你再将这个客户端拆分成多个客户端,你就会多次加载Qt Quick Controls,导致初始化客户端的启动成本较高。

trans-unit.source: Apart from that, QTEST() behaves exactly as QCOMPARE().
trans-unit.target: 除此之外，QTEST（）的行为与QCOMPARE（）完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Apart from the model's constructor, we only need to implement two functions: rowCount() returns the number of rows in the model and data() returns an item of data corresponding to a specified model index.
trans-unit.target: 除了模型的构造函数之外，我们只需要实现两个函数：rowCount（）返回模型中的行数，data（）返回与指定模型索引相对应的数据项。

trans-unit.source: Append additional meta data to plugins. If a class has Q_PLUGIN_METADATA specified, the key-value pair will be added to its meta data. This will end up in the Json object that gets resolved for the plugin at run time (accessible from QPluginLoader). This argument is typically used for tagging static plugins with information resolved by the build system.
trans-unit.target: 将其他元数据追加到插件。如果一个类指定了Q_PLUGIN_METADATA，则键值对将添加到其元数据中。这将最终在运行时为插件解析的Json对象中（可从QPluginLoader访问）。此参数通常用于使用构建系统解析的信息来标记静态插件。

trans-unit.source: Append additional meta data to plugins. If a class has Q_PLUGIN_METADATA specified, the key-value pair will be added to its meta data. This argument is typically used for tagging static plugins with information resolved by the build system.
